entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
